select
from user where user_type ='0' AND valid='1'

select
from user where user_type ='0'AND user_name like concat(concat('%',#{userName}),'%') AND valid='1'

select
from user where user_type ='0'AND phone like concat(concat('%',#{phone}),'%') AND valid='1'

select
from user where user_type ='0'AND name like concat(concat('%',#{name}),'%') AND valid='1'
